thig1.18:1.1: “I left behind the home, and went forth.
thig1.18:1.2: I left behind my child, my cattle, and all that is dear.
thig1.18:1.4: and I abandoned ignorance, using dispassion.
thig1.18:1.5: Having pulled out craving by the roots,
thig1.18:1.6: I am quenched and at peace.”
thig1.18:3.1: The Chapter of the Ones is finished.
